briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy Study for Reverse Flow Used During Carotid Artery Stenting Procedure
officialTitle: INVESTIGATION of FLOW ALTERED, SHORT TRANSCERVICAL CAROTID ARTERY STENTING in PATIENTS With SIGNIFICANT CAROTID ARTERY DISEASE With Filter.
summary: The purpose of this study is to obtain and establish the safety and efficacy of The MICHI™ Neuroprotection System with Filter (MICHI™ NPS+f) for providing cerebral embolic protection during angioplasty and stenting procedures in carotid arteries. The MICHI NPS+f also facilitates access to the carotid and neuro anatomy for the introduction of therapeutic or diagnostic endovascular devices and/or agents. It will be used in conjunction with a FDA approved carotid artery stent for the treatment of carotid artery disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Hierarchical Composite of Stroke, Myocardial Infarction, and Death
